articles.title: Sunken superyacht lifted from waters off Sicily as crews complete salvage operation - PBS
articles.description: A British-flagged luxury superyacht that sank off Sicily last year, killing U.K. tech magnate Mike Lynch and six others, was lifted from the water Saturday as salvage recovery crews completed the complex operation to bring it ashore for further investigation.
articles.content: PORTICELLO, Italy (AP) A British-flagged luxury superyacht that sank off Sicily last year, killing U.K. tech magnate Mike Lynch and six others, was lifted from the water Saturday as salvage recovery … [+2799 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: Psyche keeps its date with an asteroid, but now it’s running in backup mode - Ars Technica
articles.description: Engineers switched to a backup fuel line less than a quarter of the way through Psyche’s mission.
